text.author: Jodi Reich, Kelly Nedwick and others (see URL)
text.title: Scalar implicature in Chitonga-speaking children
text.summary: This discussion concludes based on experimental results that Chitonga speaking children acquire pragmatic competence in Scalar Implicature (SI) in the order known from previous studies.
